mapper.update:
update t_p_project
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
bid_state = #{bidState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
lat = #{lat,jdbcType=REAL},
lng = #{lng,jdbcType=REAL},
provice = #{provice,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owener_unit_id = #{owenerUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
"construct_unit _id" = #{constructUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
plan_start_date = #{planStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
plan_end_date = #{planEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
caption = #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
project_state = #{projectState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_state = #{auditState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_person_id = #{auditPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
audit_date = #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_person_id = #{createPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_p_project set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dep_id = #{depId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dep_name = #() bid_state = #{bidState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lat = #{lat,jdbcType=REAL}, lng = #{lng,jdbcType=REAL}, provice = #{provice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, area = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, addr = #{addr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, owener_unit_id = #{owenerUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, "construct_unit _id" = #{constructUnitId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mark = #{mark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plan_start_date = #{planStartDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, plan_end_date = #{planEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, caption = #{caption,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, manager_id = #{managerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, project_state = #{projectState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_state = #{auditState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_person_id = #{auditPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, audit_date = #{auditDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_person_id = #{createPersonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT A.*, B.group_name, C.username, D.`name` AS owenerUnitName, F.`name` AS constructUnitName, G.username AS createPersonName, H.username AS managerName, I.username AS auditPersonName FROM t_p_project AS A LEFT JOIN t_s_function_group AS B ON A.dep_id = B.id LEFT JOIN t_s_base_user AS C ON A.manager_id = C.ID LEFT JOIN t_c_company AS D ON A.owener_unit_id = D.id LEFT JOIN t_c_company AS F ON A.`construct_unit _id` = F.id LEFT JOIN t_s_base_user AS G ON A.create_person_id = G.ID LEFT JOIN t_s_base_user AS H ON A.manager_id = H.ID LEFT JOIN t_s_base_user AS I ON A.audit_person_id = I.ID WHERE A.create_person_id = #{uId}
